heading: Wɔhyɛ Amanamamfo a wɔwɔ nda a odzi ekyir yi mu dɛ wonnu hɔnho na wɔmbra Christ hɔ na wɔnkan hɔn mfora Israel fifo. Christ n’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 34–35.

verses.txt: Hom nyɛ aso, O hom Amanamamfo, na hom ntsie Jesus Christ, Tseasefo Nyankopɔn ne Ba no ne nsɛm a ɔahyɛ me dɛ menkã a ɔfa homho no, na hwɛ ɔse menkyerɛw dɛ:

Hom Amanamamfo nyinara, hom ndan homho mfi hom emumuyɛdze akwan do; na hom nnu homho wɔ hom ndzeyɛbɔn ho, nye hom atordzi na ndaadaa, nye hom ndwamambɔ, nye hom nsumaamu ebusudze, nye hom abosonsom, nye hom ewudzi, nye hom asɔfoɔtorsom, na enyiber, nye hom aperdzi, nye hom emumuyɛdze na ekyiwadze nyinara ho na hom mbra me nkyɛn, na wonnuma hom wɔ me dzin mu, ama hom enya hom bɔnfakyɛ, na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no aahyɛ hom mã, ama wɔaakan hom afora mo nkorɔfo a wɔy
